Key Match Events: Nicholas Pooran's 67 off 40 balls helped the West Indies clinch a two-wicket victory over India
Tail-enders Akeal Hosein and Alzarri Joseph combined for 26 runs to take the West Indies over the finish line with seven balls to spare
Pre-Game Insights: That was not a pleasing batting performance by us. The wickets were falling and the track was on the slower side. We were not good enough to get to 160+,
Post-Match Reflections: I'm satisfied that I performed. The beauty of the game is it is never over till it's over,The score didn't matter to me as long as I was batting. It was about being smart and controlling the game.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The third T20 will be held at the same venue on Tuesday
Others: Tilak Varma's 51 helped India take past the 150 mark
Three bowlers were instrumental in restricting India to an inadequate 152-7, with Akeal Hosein, Alzarri Joseph and Romario Shepherd taking two wickets apiece
